member.name: IMFSinkWriterEx.GetTransformForStream
member.summary: Gets a pointer to a Media Foundation transform (MFT) for a specified stream.
member.param: The zero-based index of a stream.
The zero-based index of the MFT to retrieve.
Receives a pointer to a GUID that specifies the category of the MFT. For a list of possible values, see MFT_CATEGORY.
Receives a pointer to the interface of the MFT. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: The Sink Writer implements this interface in Windows 8. To get a pointer to this interface, call on the Sink Writer.
